channel.title: The Gauntlet Blog - Getting Featured in Codex
channel.description:
Today on The Gauntlet Blog, I continue my series on using the various parts of The Gauntlet community to aid your TTRPG design work. In this installment, I'm talking about getting featured in the Codex zine.
https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/getting-featured-in-codex
